title: Senior Software Engineer
summary: Led development of key features for a flagship product, mentored junior engineers, and improved system performance by 20%.
details: Architected and implemented a new microservices-based backend.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to define project requirements.
Introduced CI/CD pipelines, reducing deployment time by 50%.
Received company award for innovation in Q3 2022.

title: Software Engineer
summary: Developed and maintained web applications using modern JavaScript frameworks. Contributed to a 15% increase in user engagement.
details: Built responsive user interfaces with Vue.js and React.
Worked in an Agile environment, participating in daily stand-ups and sprint planning.
Integrated third-party APIs for enhanced functionality.
Wrote unit and integration tests to ensure code quality.
